attributes.action: Close down South Lakes Safari Zoo in Dalton in Furness
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2017/may/20/south-lakes-safari-zoo-animal-deaths

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Lakes_Safari_Zoo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lUQrC9SKt9M

BBC documentary- Trouble at the Zoo
attributes.background: David Gill (millionaire) opened a “Conservation Park” in Cumbria in 1994. 486 inhabitants died from exposure,emaciation,hypothermia & being run over between Dec 2013 - Sep 2016. A white rhino was shot after escaping.CAPS called it the worst zoo it had ever seen. All incidents listed in references.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The South Lakes Safari Zoo is the responsibility of Borough of Barrow in Furness Council.

You can also petition Borough of Barrow in Furness Council. You can find out more here: 

https://www.barrowbc.gov.uk/about-the-council/democracy-and-elections/petitions/

You could also start a new petition about something the UK Parliament or Government are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government to set up a central body to license, monitor and enforce standards in zoos.
